lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson was easily the fastest driver on the two-mile oval at the Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, Calif. He won the pole for the Pepsi 500 on Sunday with a fast lap of 180.397 miles an hour, followed by Jeff Gordon, A. J. Allmendinger and Kasey Kahne.
